DOC.brief_summary: We investigate potential pharmacokinetic drug-drug interaction Tadalafil Tamsulosin healthy male volunteer receive Tadalafil alone , Tamsulosin alone , together 3 period repeatedly .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Tadalafil Tamsulosin
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer , age 20 55 year . 2 . The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 19 kg/m2 , 27 kg/m2 3 . Subjects ability comprehend objective , content study property study drug participate trial willingness sign inform consent write 1 . Presence medical history concurrent disease may interfere treatment safety assessment completion clinical study , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . 2 . Liver enzyme ( AST , ALT ) level exceed one half time maximum normal range . 3 . Systolic blood pressure < 90mmHg Diastolic blood pressure < 70 mmHg , systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg ( Sitting blood pressure ) screening procedure .
